blogs.author: Fahmed

blogs.title: React JS Blog Page Demo
blogs.body: This page was created using React JS only. It currently does not connect to a database and does not have JWT-based login or authentication implemented yet. The purpose of this demo is to showcase the frontend structure and basic routing setup.
blogs.author: Fahmed

blogs.title: Learning MERN Stack
blogs.body: This is a simple blog page built with React JS. Although backend integration and authentication are not yet included, I am very interested in learning the MERN stack and plan to expand this project further with MongoDB, Express, and Node.js.
blogs.author: Rashid
